print_time.label: Print Time
print_time.description: How long the printer is taking to produce the item.

dimensional_accuracy.label: Dimensional Error
dimensional_accuracy.description: How far off the size of the final print is from the intended size.

strength.label: Strength
strength.description: How strong the print is, relative to the same model printed.

underextrusion.label: Underextrusion
underextrusion.description: How much underextrusion was visible in the model.

topography.label: Topography
topography.description: How visible the borders between the layers are, seen from the top.

pillowing.label: Pillowing
pillowing.description: How much visible pillowing occurred in the top skin.

surface_scars.label: Surface Scars
surface_scars.description: How much visible scarring there is on the surface due to travel moves.

top_skin_overhang.label: Top Skin Overhang
top_skin_overhang.description: How bad the skin is sagging due to insufficient support from infill.

wall_smoothness.label: Wall Smoothness
wall_smoothness.description: Generally how smooth the walls are (where they need to be smooth).

loss_of_detail.label: Loss of Detail
loss_of_detail.description: How much detail was lost in the end result.

banding.label: Banding
banding.description: How much difference in colour is visible between different layers.

infill_shinethrough.label: Infill Shine-through
infill_shinethrough.description: How visible the infill was shining through the walls.

ringing.label: Ringing
ringing.description: How much ringing is visible on the sides of the walls.

blips.label: Blips
blips.description: How many blips are visible on the surface.

stringing.label: Stringing
stringing.description: How much stringing there is in places where neat travel moves should've been.

z_scar.label: Z Scar
z_scar.description: How visible the Z scar is.

overhang_sagging.label: Overhang Sagging
overhang_sagging.description: How bad the overhung areas of the print are sagging.

support_scarring.label: Support Scarring
support_scarring.description: How bad the scars are that are left by support.

elephant_feet.label: Elephant Feet
elephant_feet.description: How much wider the bottom of the print was than the rest of the print.

overheating.label: Overheating
overheating.description: How much the model deformed due to overheating.

post_processing.label: Post Processing Work
post_processing.description: How much post-processing work needed to be done.

splitting.label: Splitting
splitting.description: How much the layers split apart.

warping.label: Warping
warping.description: How much warping horizontal occurred. Be sure to account for the fact that large prints warp more.

bed_release.label: Bed Release
bed_release.description: Lack of bed adhesion. Did the print get loose from the bed?

clogging.label: Clogging
clogging.description: How badly the nozzle clogged due to this print.

printer_damage.label: Printer Damage
printer_damage.description: How badly damaged the printer was due to this print.
